item.title: Ammissione al corso di “PhD in Analisi Matematica, Modelli e Applicazioni” - Progetto "Unveiling Earth’s Critical Resources for Clean Energy and a sustainable Future - (EarthSafe)" HORIZON-MSCA-2022-DN-01-01 - MSCA Doctoral Networks 2022
item.description:
From: 02-11-2023 13:00
To: 05-12-2023 13:00
Category: Dottorati

Ammissione al corso di “PhD in Analisi Matematica, Modelli e Applicazioni”


Topics:


Project 5 - Validation, Verification and Uncertainty Quantification of the computational model of crustal flows

Project 6 - Development of novel Reduced Order Models for the efficient numerical simulation of crustal flows


Durata / Duration: 3 anni / 3 years
